message: Let's start fair, Bob. 50/50 split seems like the most reasonable way to begin.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still quite fair.
I understand you want more, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up more than 5%.  Let's split it 55/45. We can both still get a good deal.
Considering inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I should get more than half.
